name: And To All A Goodnight
description:
A Christmas-themed version of my previous project Picking Up The Pieces made for Meditations. This game aired on Christmas Day 2019 and was live for 24 hours.

One of my favorite parts of holidays is cleaning up after the celebration and remembering all the moments that made it special while I make the house tidy again.

Click and drag the objects back to where they belong.

Sound from Freesound.org. Icons from TheNounProject.com. Background art by Pascal Campion.
